thread.title: Volkswagen’s Other Problem Is Made in China
thread.title_full: Volkswagen’s Other Problem Is Made in China - WSJ

author: Abheek Bhattacharya
title: Volkswagen’s Other Problem Is Made in China
text:
Volkswagen’s emissions scandal would be bad news in any given year. But shareholders have it worse now because they no longer have the consolation of runaway growth in the car maker’s biggest market—China.
At least the allegation that Volkswagen cheated on U.S. emissions tests of its diesel-powered cars isn’t likely to directly spread to China. The company barely sells any diesel cars there. And its two joint ventures in China, both... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
